hieros

There are four words for ‘land’:

  1. [[𓈇]] taui : two lands / towns
  2. [[𓈋]] dval valley Tal / tell 𓏏
  3. [[𓇾]] ter / terra
  4. [[𓈉]] shan? desert = 𓂧𓈙𓂋𓏏𓈉 d.sh.r.t dash=red (land)
  5. [[𓊖]] *court Kur, which is abundant in Sumeria is restricted to cities ⇔ [[𓈎]]

related: 𓇿 𓈄 𓈅 𓊔 𓊕
